edu.cornell.library.scholars.webapp.controller.api.distribute

Interface DataDistributor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataDistributor, AbstractSparqlBindingDistributor, FileDistributor, HelloDistributor, JavaScriptTransformDistributor, RdfGraphDistributor, SelectFromContentDistributor, SelectFromGraphDistributor, SelectingFileDistributor

    public interface DataDistributor
    Life-cycle of a DataDistributor:
    • Instantiated to service a single HTTP request.
    • init() -- Called one time.
    • getContentType() -- Called one time.
    • writeOutput() -- Called one time.
    • close() -- Called exactly once.
    • Garbage-collected (probably)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  DataDistributor.ActionFailedException
      A problem occurred while creating the output.
      static class  DataDistributor.DataDistributorException
      A problem occurred while creating or running the DataDistributor.
      static class  DataDistributor.MissingParametersException
      The HTTP request did not contain one or more required parameters.
      static class  DataDistributor.NoSuchActionException
      The controller could not find a DataDistributor configured for the requested action.
      static class  DataDistributor.NotAuthorizedException
      The user registered to the current HTTP session may not run the DataDistributor for the requested action.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Called exactly once.
      String getContentType()
      States the MIME type of the output from this instance.
      void init(DataDistributorContext ddContext)
      Called exactly once, after instantiation is complete.
      void writeOutput(OutputStream output)
      Writes to the output stream (does not close it).

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(DataDistributorContext ddContext)
   throws DataDistributor.DataDistributorException
        Called exactly once, after instantiation is complete.
        Parameters:
        ddContext - provides access to requrest parameters and triple-store content.
        Throws:
        DataDistributor.DataDistributorException

      • getContentType

        String getContentType()
               throws DataDistributor.DataDistributorException
        States the MIME type of the output from this instance. The MIME type may be hardcoded, derived from the configuration, or derived from the request parameters. Called exactly once, after init().
        Returns:
        the MIME type of the (expected) output.
        Throws:
        DataDistributor.DataDistributorException

      • writeOutput

        void writeOutput(OutputStream output)
          throws DataDistributor.DataDistributorException
        Writes to the output stream (does not close it). This output will become the body of the HTTP response. Called no more than once, after getContentType(). Might not be called if a previous method throws an exception, or if the content type is not acceptable to the requestor.
        Parameters:
        output -
        Throws:
        DataDistributor.DataDistributorException

      • close

        void close()
    throws DataDistributor.DataDistributorException
        Called exactly once.
        Throws:
        DataDistributor.DataDistributorException
